APP_DETAILS_DEPRECATED_ALERT_SUBTITLE: Een wijziging in deze app voorkomt dat deze automatisch bijgewerkt kan worden. U kunt nog steeds deze versie gebruiken en handmatig bijwerken, maar het wordt aanbevolen om over te schakelen naar een nieuwere versie en uw gegevens te migreren. U kunt een bijgewerkte versie vinden in de app store onder dezelfde naam.
APP_DETAILS_DEPRECATED_ALERT_TITLE: Deze app wordt niet meer ondersteund
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_INSTALL: Installatie van app {{id}} mislukt, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_RESET: Kon app {{id}} niet resetten, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_START: Starten van app {{id}} is mislukt, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_STOP: Stoppen van app {{id}} is mislukt, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_RESTART: Kon app {{id}} niet herstarten, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_UNINSTALL: Installatie van app {{id}} mislukt, zie logs voor meer details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_UPDATE: Bijwerken van app {{id}} is mislukt, zie logs voor meer informatie
APP_ERROR_APP_FORCE_EXPOSED: App {{id}} werkt alleen met een openbaar domein
APP_ERROR_APP_NOT_EXPOSABLE: App {{id}} kan niet openbaar worden gemaakt
APP_ERROR_ARCHITECTURE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Uw architectuur {{arch}} wordt niet ondersteund door app {{id}}
APP_ERROR_DOMAIN_ALREADY_IN_USE: Domein {{domain}} is al in gebruik door app {{id}}
APP_ERROR_DOMAIN_REQUIRED_IF_EXPOSE_APP: Domein is vereist als de app openbaar is
APP_ERROR_INVALID_CONFIG: App {{id}} heeft een ongeldig config.json bestand
APP_INSTALL_FORM_DOMAIN_NAME_HINT: Zorg ervoor dat dit exacte domein een A-record bevat dat naar uw IP verwijst.
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_FQDNIP: {{label}} moet een geldig domein of IP-adres zijn
APP_INSTALL_FORM_OPEN_PORT_HINT: Een poort openen op de host? Deze app zal toegankelijk zijn op {{internalIp}}:{{port}}. (Eenvoudiger maar minder veilig)
APP_INSTALL_FORM_EXPOSE_LOCAL: App openbaar maken voor het lokaal netwerk
APP_INSTALL_FORM_EXPOSE_LOCAL_HINT: De app openbaar maken voor het lokale netwerk? Deze app is bereikbaar op {{appId}}.{{domain}}. (Ga naar de instellingenpagina om uw lokale domein in te stellen)
APP_RESET_FORM_SUBTITLE: Alle gegevens voor deze app zullen verloren gaan.
APP_RESET_FORM_WARNING: Weet u het zeker? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt.
APP_BACKUP_SUBTITLE: Er zal een tar-bestand aangemaakt worden in de back-up map met de gegevens van je app.
APP_RESTORE_WARNING: Do you really want to restore backup {{id}} made on {{date}}?
APP_RESTORE_SUBTITLE: All the current data of the app will be erased and replaced with the data from the backup. It is recommended to backup your app before restoring.
APP_STORE_DELETE_DIALOG_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete appstore {{name}}?
APP_STORE_DELETE_ERROR_LAST_STORE: You cannot delete the last appstore
APP_STORE_DELETE_ERROR_APPS_EXIST: There are installed apps that belong to this appstore. Please uninstall them first
APP_UNINSTALL_FORM_SUBTITLE: Alle gegevens voor deze app zullen verloren gaan.
APP_UNINSTALL_FORM_WARNING: Weet u het zeker? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt.
APP_UPDATE_CONFIG_SUCCESS: App config updated successfully. Restart the app to apply the changes
APP_UPDATE_ERROR_MIN_TIPI_VERSION: App {{id}} update requires Tipi version {{minVersion}} or higher. Please update your instance.
APP_UPDATE_FORM_SUBTITLE_2: Make sure you've read the release notes of the app and you've backed up your app data.
APP_BACKUP_ERROR: Failed to backup {{id}}, see logs for more details
APP_RESTORE_ERROR: Failed to restore {{id}}, see logs for more details
AUTH_ERROR_ADMIN_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already an admin user. Please login to create a new user from the admin panel.
AUTH_ERROR_INVALID_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long
AUTH_ERROR_TOTP_ALREADY_ENABLED: 2FA is already enabled for this user
AUTH_ERROR_TOTP_NOT_ENABLED: 2FA is niet ingeschakeld voor deze gebruiker
AUTH_FORM_ERROR_PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_LE: Password confirmation must be at least 8 characters
AUTH_FORM_ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_INSTRUCTIONS: To get started, run this command on your server and then refresh this page. If you have previously done so, the password reset request may have expired. In that case please retry
AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password. And your email {{email}}
AUTH_TOTP_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter the code from your authenticator app
DASHBOARD_IP_WARNING: Warning, you might be at risk! it looks like you are accessing your instance through a public IP address. This makes your dashboard and all apps that you install vulnerable to attackers
DELETE_BACKUP_MODAL_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete backup {{id}} made on {{date}}?
GUEST_DASHBOARD_NO_APPS_SUBTITLE: Ask your administrator to add apps to the guest dashboard or login to see your apps.
LINKS_ADD_SUBTITLE: Add external link to the dashboard
LINKS_DELETE_SUBTITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this external link?
MY_APPS_EMPTY_SUBTITLE: Install an app from the app store to get started
MY_APPS_UPDATE_ALL_FORM_SUBTITLE_1: Do you want to update all your apps to the latest version?
MY_APPS_UPDATE_ALL_FORM_SUBTITLE_2: This will update all your apps to the latest version. Make sure you've read the release notes of the apps and you've backed up your app data.
SERVER_ERROR_APP_STORE_ALREADY_EXISTS: An app store with the same url already exists
APP_STORE_CLONE_ERROR: Error cloning app store at {{url}}. Is it a valid git repository?
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_MAINTENANCE_SUBTITLE: Common actions to perform on your instance
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_NEW_VERSION: A new version ({{version}}) of Tipi is available
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_STAY_UP_TO_DATE: Stay up to date with the latest version of Tipi
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_UPDATE_REPO_SUBTITLE: Use this button to update your appstore
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_UPDATE_REPO_MODAL_SUBTI: This will reset your repository and pull the latest changes from GitHub
SETTINGS_APPSTORES_WARNING: Make sure you trust the appstores you add!
SETTINGS_GENERAL_ALLOW_AUTO_THEMES_HINT: Be surprised by themes that change automatically based on the time of the year.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_ALLOW_ERROR_MONITORING_: Error monitoring is used to track errors and improve Tipi. Keep this option enabled to help us improve Tipi.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_DOMAIN_NAME_HINT: Make sure this exact domain contains an A record pointing to your IP.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_GUEST_DASHBOARD_HINT: This will allow non-authenticated users to see a limited dashboard and easily access the running apps on your instance.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_INTERNAL_IP_HINT: IP address your server is listening on.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_LOCAL_DOMAIN_HINT: Domain name used for accessing apps in your local network. Your apps will be accessible at app-name.local-domain.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SETTINGS_UPDATED: Settings updated. Restart your instance to apply new settings.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_STORAGE_PATH_HINT: Path to the storage directory. Make sure it is an absolute path and that it exists.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SUBTITLE: This will update your settings.json file. Make sure you know what you are doing before updating these values.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_2FA_SUBTITLE: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an additional layer of security to your account.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_2FA_SUBTITLE_2: When enabled, you will be prompted to enter a code from your authenticator app when you log in.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUBTIT: Changing your password will log you out of all devices.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_FORM_I: Must be a valid email address
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_FORM_P: Your password is required to change your username.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_SUBTIT: Changing your username will log you out of all devices.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_ENTER_2FA_CODE: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
SETTINGS_SECURITY_FORM_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
SETTINGS_SECURITY_PASSWORD_NEEDED_HINT: Your password is required to change two-factor authentication settings.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_SCAN_QR_CODE: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app.
SYSTEM_ERROR_CURRENT_VERSION_IS_LATEST: Current version is already up to date
SYSTEM_ERROR_DEMO_MODE_LIMIT: Only 6 apps can be installed in the demo mode. Please uninstall an other app to install a new one.
SYSTEM_ERROR_MAJOR_VERSION_UPDATE: The major version has changed. Please update manually (instructions in release notes)
SYSTEM_ERROR_YOU_MUST_BE_LOGGED_IN: You must be logged in to perform this action
